biotools.summary:
PReMiS analyzes mass spectrometric data collected from the 6×5 LC-MS/MS Peptide Reference Mix and calculates quality control metrics for instrument performance. Thermo raw files and AB Sciex wiff files can be analyzed directly. Data in other vendor formats must be converted to mzML prior to analysis.

In addition to its general reporting features, PReMiSallows you to track performance over time and compare parameters across instruments.
